title: The Whiteboard Marker Heist
setting: Horizon Dynamics, engineering floor, Friday 10 AM
premise: Every single whiteboard marker on the engineering floor has vanished -- all forty-eight of them gone from six conference rooms. They were there at 5 PM Thursday but missing Friday morning. A ransom note demands 'better snacks in the vending machine.'

suspects.name: Zoe Carpenter
suspects.motive: Led the unsuccessful vending machine petition last month and was publicly ignored
suspects.alibi: I left at 5:15 Thursday. I had concert tickets for The Waves at the Riverside Amphitheater. Show started at 7 PM and didn't end until 10:30. I have the ticket stubs.

suspects.name: Ivan Petrov
suspects.motive: Hates whiteboard brainstorming sessions and wants them replaced with digital tools
suspects.alibi: I worked late until around 8 PM Thursday fixing test scripts. I was at my desk in the east wing the entire time. Then I took the elevator down and drove home.

suspects.name: Mel Washington
suspects.motive: Thinks the engineering team wastes too much time doodling during meetings
suspects.alibi: I left at 4:45 PM for a parent-teacher conference at Lincoln Middle School at 5:30. It ran long and I didn't leave the school until almost 7 PM.

suspects.name: Carla Vega
suspects.motive: Was recently scolded for doodling during a whiteboard session and found it humiliating
suspects.alibi: I stayed until 6 PM doing a server migration. Then I went to my evening class at Metro Community College from 7 to 9 PM. I'm taking project management this semester.

clues.title: Cleaning Crew Timing
clues.content: The cleaning crew services the engineering floor from 6:30 to 7:30 PM. They confirm the markers were still in all six rooms when they started at 6:30 but cannot confirm after that since they don't check supplies.

clues.title: Ransom Note Analysis
clues.content: The ransom note was printed, not handwritten, but it was printed on the engineering floor's dedicated printer. The print log shows one job at 7:48 PM Thursday from a workstation in the east wing.

clues.title: Concert Venue Check
clues.content: The Riverside Amphitheater's website shows The Waves concert was originally scheduled for Thursday but was postponed to the following week due to weather. No show took place Thursday night.

hints.text: Focus on the timeline between 6:30 PM and 8 PM Thursday evening. Who actually had the opportunity?
Can you verify that a particular evening event actually took place as scheduled on Thursday night?
